moves.1. e4 e5 2. Nf3 f6: f6?  better would be nc3 or d6.
moves.6... Kg6 7. Qf5+ Kh6: Anyone remember that age-old rule about not putting your king out in the middle of the board?  Yeah...
moves.8. d4+: d4, a discover check and mate in a few, no matter how black plays this.
moves.9. Qxg5#: So, remember that if you're ever black and it's your second move after 1. e4 e5 2. nf3, don't play f6, unless you like losing odds.
